name: CurrentStatus
author: Charandeep Singh

sections.description: CurrentStatus Plugin is used to show your current status and mood on your blog. Display of text can be customized. Status is entered through a text field and mood can be selected from an dropdown list of 155 different moods.
sections.installation:
1. Download and Unpack the currentstatus directory from the zip file.
  2. Upload currentstatus directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Place this code <?php echo CurrentStatus_GetCurrentStatus(); ?> in your template, where you want to display your status and mood.
sections.faq:
Where can I discuss any issue about this plugin?

Any issue, bug etc can be discuss here: http://itgeek.in/?p=180

short_description: This plugin is used to show your current "status" and "mood" on blog.
description: CurrentStatus Plugin is used to show your current status and mood on your blog. Display of text can be customized. Status is entered through a text field and mood can be selected from an dropdown list of 155 different moods.

screenshots.caption: After Installation, you can see another option added on your settings options i.e. CurrentStatus.
Admin panel of the CurrentStatus Plugin.
